price: Namni guyyaa san wanti inni durseefii booda aanse itti himama.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
